title: Mundane and Extraordinary NPCs
content: A mundane NPC does not know any Extraordinary abilities and has very little to zero Energy points.An Extraordinary NPC should have access to one or more Extraordinary ability and have enough Energy points to produce their average damage output for the first 5 rounds of combat. Any Extraordinary abilities that don't deal direct damage should have their costs compared against the table of damaging abilities and then calculated as if they dealt corresponding amount of damage.
